titles.title: Recognizing and commending Viola Liuzzo for her extraordinary courage and for her contribution to the United States.
Recognizing and commending Viola Liuzzo for her extraordinary courage and for her contribution to the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: Recognizes Viola Liuzzo for her extraordinary courage and for her contribution to ensuring that the United States is a nation with liberty and justice for all.
